name: 謝佳玲
objective: 培養正確的英語發音與腔調，並訓練學生熟悉如何使用音標記錄發音以及辨認學習者在英語發音中經常發生的問題。課程中也介紹英語語音系統的主要規則。
schedule:
1. Introduction
2. Hsieh (Chapter 1-2)
3. Hsieh (Chapter 3-4)
4. Hsieh (Chapter 5)
5. Hsieh (Chapter 6)
6. Hsieh (Chapter 7-8)
7. Hsieh (Chapter 9)
8. Hsieh (Chapter 10)
9. Midterm exam
10. Miller (Chapter 2)
11. Miller (Chapter 3-4)
12. Miller (Chapter 5-6)
13. Miller (Chapter 7-8)
14. Miller (Chapter 9-10)
15. Fromkin (Part 1)
16. Fromkin (Part 2)
17. Fromkin (Part 3)
18. Final exam
scorePolicy:
1. Participation and assignments: 20%
2. Quizzes and exams: 80%
materials:
1. Hsieh, Chia-Ling. 2004. English Spelling and Pronunciation. Taipei: The Crane Publishing Co. Ltd.
2. Miller, Sue F. 2005. Targeting Pronunciation: Communicating Clearly in English. 2nd ed. Boston, MA: Houghton Mifflin Company.
3. Fromkin, Victoria and Robert Rodman. 1998. An Introduction to Language. 6th ed. Orlando, Florida: Harcourt Brace College Publishers.
